::Wolveritron/Prime::

    Wolveritron walked out into the open, bleeding and wounded. He knew that 
he could die if he didn't get to a CR chamber. He called out.
    "Maximals, please don't shoot," Wolveritron said as loud as he could, as 
his comm was out. "I need a CR Chamber badly. It was your slaggin autoguns 
that did this!"
    He couldn't really control his temper, it was the Wolverine in him.
    Optimus Prime heard this. He couldn't turn down a broken bot.
    "I will let you in, but you must disarm yourself and give me all your 
weapons," Prime said. 
    "No way bub!" Wolveritron said. "I can't give up my weapons. They are 
attached to me."
    "Fine, but you will be under watch," Prime said. He went out and helped 
Wolveritron to the CR chamber. He put him in and set the healing process.
